tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE pest_infestation_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  pest_type VARCHAR(50),
  infestation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE InfestationReports (
   report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   pest_id UUID,
   control_id UUID,
   report_date DATE,
   report_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE pests (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50),
infestation_level INT,
location VARCHAR(100),
infestation_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE pest_control_methods (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
method_name VARCHAR(50),
effectiveness_rating INT,
cost DECIMAL(10,2));

CREATE TABLE infestation_reports (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
report_date TIMESTAMP,
pest_id INT,
method_id INT,
report_details TEXT);

CREATE TABLE pest_control_specialists (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50),
expertise_area VARCHAR(100),
phone_number VARCHAR(20));

CREATE TABLE infestation_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_id INT NOT NULL,
  pest_id INT NOT NULL,
  infestation_date DATE NOT NULL,
  infestation_level INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_site_id FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES infestation_sites(site_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_pest_id FOREIGN KEY (pest_id) REFERENCES pests(pest_id)
);

CREATE TABLE infestation_responses (
  response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  record_id INT NOT NULL,
  measure_id INT NOT NULL,
  response_date DATE NOT NULL,
  response_description TEXT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_record_id FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES infestation_records(record_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_measure_id FOREIGN KEY (measure_id) REFERENCES pest_control_measures(measure_id)
);
